1.title: Ginger Ale Kit Kat
1.plot: Arne Venema & Spencer Douglass make an interesting discovery on their late night journey to 7-11... a Ginger Ale Flavored Kit Kat!!! Will this be a voyage of delicious discovery or a nightmare of horrific taste bud assault? The episode that started the whole series.

2.title: Ramu Bottle
2.plot: Spencer and Arne stumble across some Japanese Ramune Soda at the supermarket and try it out. Will they love it or hate it? Check out this review of Sangaria Ramu Bottle Ramune Soda to find out!

3.title: Marukyo Red Bean Cake
3.plot: Arne and Spencer decide to try out some Red Bean cakes. Arne has a bit of trouble with the packaging and the guys have a mixed opinion of this product of Japan. Check out this review of Marukyo Red Bean Paste Cake!

4.title: McDonalds Prawn (Ebi) Burger
4.plot: In this episode, Spencer and Arne have got a special treat. They went to McDonald's and picked up a couple of Ebi Burgers, only available in Hong Kong, Singapore and Japan! Witness as Spencer try out the Ebi Burger while Arne conquers the Mega Ebi Burger! What are Ebi burgers I hear you say? Ebi Burger - the finest shrimps molded into succulent patties between two wheat buns with lettuce, Thousand Island sauce and a spot of mustard!

5.title: Meiji Yan Yan Yogurt Cream Snack
5.plot: Spencer decided to bring some new treats back from 7-11 for Arne and he chanced upon this little beauty: Yan Yan Yogurt Cream Snack from Meiji foods of Japan. Will Yan Yan Yogurt Cream Snack be a hit with Arne or not?

6.title: Lotte Pepero Nude Snack
6.plot: Arne and Spencer do a review of Pepero Nude, a reverse biscuit, one of the most popular snacks in Korea.

7.title: Meiji Melty Kiss Strawberry Chocolate
7.plot: Arne gets excited and purchases a treat from 7 eleven for the high price of HK$22.90: Melty Kiss Fruity Strawberry Chocolate, product of Japan. Will it be delicious? Will it be terrible? And why the hell is it called Melty Kiss? Spencer and Arne will find out.

8.title: Blueberry Hard Stick
8.plot: Spencer & Arne review an unusually named blueberry biscuit from Japan: Kabaya Hard Stick Blueberry Chocolate. Will hard sticks stick together? How many hard sticks can Spencer take in his mouth? These questions and more, answered in this review.

9.title: Fanta Shake Shake
9.plot: At the request of our good friend Pablomaccool, Arne & Spencer review Fanta Shake Shake Grape Jelly Soda & Fanta Shake Shake Orange Jelly Soda. Will Arne and Spencer enjoy this jelly filled product of Taiwan?

10.title: Roasted Sausage Flavor Mongkok Style Potato Chips by Jack'n Jill
10.plot: Arne & Spencer come across a bag of chips that gets quite the review. Our first product from Hong Kong, comes from the beautiful and densely populated district of Mong Kok. The question is "what does Mong Kok style taste like?". Watch the video to find out.

imdb.title: Crazy from Kong
synopsis: At Crazy From Kong (CFK) we find the strangest snacks, junk food and drinks in Asia, eat them and review them!
